data.text: Dwaruru Jehova Nyasaye, un ji duto mobolore manie piny,
Yaye jo-Kereth modak e dho nam,
Piny mantiere e dho nam kama jo-Kereth odakie biro bedo kar jokwath
Nobedi mar joma odongʼ mar dhood Juda;
Ma e kum ma jogi nonwangʼ kuom sunga margi,
Jehova Nyasaye biro bedo nigi malich
Enorie bade kuomu un joma odak yo nyandwat,
Kweth mag jamni biro nindo piny motimo kanyo,
Ma e dala maduongʼ mane odak gi kwe,
